member.name: M:exiii.Library.OSC.OscPacket.parseMessage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Takes in an OSC bundle package in byte form and parses it into a more usable OscBundle object
member.returns: Message containing various arguments and an address

member.name: M:exiii.Library.OSC.OscPacket.parseBundle(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Takes in an OSC bundle package in byte form and parses it into a more usable OscBundle object
member.returns: Bundle containing elements and a timetag

member.name: P:exiii.Library.OSC.Timetag.Fraction
member.summary: Gets or sets the fraction of a second in the timestamp. the double precision number is multiplied by 2^32 giving an accuracy down to about 230 picoseconds ( 1/(2^32) of a second)
